resources: Ham Radio Basics Quiz // The following strings are all relate to question 1 Which Frequencies are in the 2m band? 144.000MHz 145.325MHz 146.000MHz 147.500MHz //The following strings are all relate to question 2 What is the frequency range of the 70cm band? 400.000MHz - 520.000MHz 410.000MHz - 510.000MHz 420.000MHz - 500.000MHz 430.000MHz - 440.000MHz //The following strings all relate to question 3 Is the antenna or the amount of power more important? //The following strings all relate to question 4 What is the biggest interference in long range transmissions?
